'''Josh''' is a guy [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] dates to get back at [[Ross Geller|Ross]] for dating [[Amanda (Ross' date)|Amanda]]. He was portrayed by [[Brian Smith]] in "[[The One With Joey's New Girlfriend]]".

==History==
Josh is younger than Rachel, as he's still in college. He used Rachel to get beer, and also stole from Rachel and [[Monica Geller|Monica]].
